The Extended Integer (XInt) Library » Rationales

But why default to an insecure random number generator? Why not default to the secure one?

Because the secure one isn't available on all systems. If I relied on random_device as a default, the library wouldn't compile under those systems. If I used xint::strong_random_generator, it would compile, but would always fail on them.
